March 14, 1982 D London and Southern Counties (Fourth Section - South)
London and Southern Counties (Fourth Section - South) 42 Test Piece Contest London and Southern Counties Area london-and-southern-counties-fourth-section-south National Championship of Great Britain (Fourth Section Final)
London and Southern Counties
Fourth
Excelsior [Hanmer]
Watford Colosseum, Watford, Hertfordshire, England, UK Due to the large entry (34 bands), in this year B&H divided the contest into two sections of 17, divided geographically by the River Thames. Following standard rules, two bands from each section were invited to the finals.
Nov. 29, 2020, 11:33 a.m. Nov. 29, 2020, 11:38 a.m.
